About us
â€œChengdu Huitong West-electronic Co., Ltd.â€�(HTW for short). we are a manufacturer that's been focusing on R&D, development, and production of piezoelectric ceramics and ultrasonic transducer/sensors for 50 years.
We have a team with strong scientific research ability, a high management level, a high-quality staff, and a strong sense of responsibility. we've obtained IATF 16949 certification at the outset of our establishment. And was assessed as a "high-tech enterprise" by the Sichuan Provincial Science and Technology Department.
We produce highly reliable and economical ultrasonic sensors and supply goods internationally, which have applied in various areas such as the detection of paper multi-feed for printer/scanner/ATM, the detection of distance for vehicles, object/fluid level detection, gas/wind/liquid flow meter, ground material detection for vacuum cleaner and cleaning robot, ultrasonic sensing modules(transudcer+circuit board with the algorithm) for self-propelled robot and vacuum cleaner.
We've won a high reputation internationally through our quality and aftersales service. At the same time, we have a strong ability to customize piezoelectric ceramic devices and ultrasonic sensors/transducers for different applications for customers, we offer not only ultrasonic transducers/sensors, but also offer COMPLETE SOLUTIONS.
Welcome you to come to visit us at ANY TIME.

Chengdu Huitong West-electronic Co.,Ltd
Chengdu Huitong West-electronic Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is located in the southwest of China. The company is specialized in piezoelectric ceramics and ultrasonic sensors, we have a team with strong scientific research ability, high management level, good employee quality, and strong sense of responsibility. we are IATF16949 certificated and has been awarded honors as National High Tech Enterprise, National "little giant" firm (specialized and sophisticated enterprises that produce new and unique products), Chengdu New Materials Enterprise, etc.
The application fields of our products include automotive applications, cleaning appliances, robots, home appliances, office equipment, 3D printing equipment, semiconductor equipment, the Internet of Things, medical treatment, etc. The product indicators and reliability have reached industry-leading levels and are best-selling in domestic and foreign markets.
We adhere to the concept of innovative development and quality priority and continue to provide high-quality products and services to the market. We look forward to working hand in hand with our partners to achieve win-win cooperation.

The company has independent import and export management rights, owns own brand (HTW) and intellectual property rights. The products are sold to domestic and foreign markets. The products comply with EU RoHs and Reach environmental protection requirements, and automotive sensors comply with ELV directives.

“Chengdu Huitong West-electronic.,Ltd”(HTW for short) was established in 2007 and is a professional manufacturer of piezoelectric ceramic materials and piezoelectric ceramics R&D, production and sales. So far, he has more than 40 years of experience in the development and production of electroceramic materials and piezoelectric devices.
